structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text: Duly commissioned special law enforcement officers shall have the right to use and operate public emergency vehicles in accordance with KRS 189.910 through 189.993.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 14, effective January 1, 1977.
